page.title: 15AT LITTLE PLUMSTEAD SCHOOL
page.content: We visited Little Plumstead{school which is in a{rural}area. When it was first built in{1865}there was one classroom. That is now the dining room. Since the school was built three extensions have been added to it. The first was in 1881 when it was enlarged to take 120 pupils.Today there are 97 children in the school. The site covers about 2 acres,including the playing field across the road. Here they have a running track and a jumping pit. There are four classes in the school,the age group is 5-11. There are 18 in the first class,25 in the second,26 in the third and 28 in the fourth class. The children do lots of activities including swimming at a senior school near Norwich. The school has 4 staff and a secretary.They do not have a crossing patrol or a can- teen;but the children like the school.
